title: Have a Spirit of Honor
itunes:title: Have a Spirit of Honor
description:
In this message, let Joel remind you of the importance of living a life of honor. Romans 12:10 tells us to “take delight in honoring each other.”

Visit joelosteen.com to receive daily updates and encouragement from Joel Osteen.

Have you followed Joel Osteen on Instagram? instagram.com/joelosteen.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
